TeamTech.subtitle: Our Team and History
TeamTech.title: In E-service Company, We are so proud of great and smart team
TeamTech.txt: The story began in 2020, when the company started to hire creative people. We started with 10 employees where every one comes with great thoughts and works hard to grow our company and make it bigger and bigger by studying needs of the markets, the modern technologies and implementing high quality strategies. Now our company has more than 50+ employees and developers. Our team always keeps learning to update their knowledge and sharp their skills. Our team is the sprit and powerful of our company. E-service's team You are Great and  We really so proud of you.
